content.question: Which of the following applications is most likely to benefit from the use of crowdsourcing?

choices.label: An application that allows users to convert measurement units (e.g., inches to centimeters, ounces to liters)
An application that allows users to purchase tickets for a local museum
An application that allows users to compress the pictures on their devices to optimize storage space
An application that allows users to view descriptions and photographs of local landmarks

content.answer: An application that allows users to view descriptions and photographs of local landmarks

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how collaboration affects the development of a solution.
